metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10600 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: ubuntu-image 1.0 before 2017-07-07, when invoked as non-root, creates filesin the resulting image with the uid of the invoking user. When theresulting image is booted, a local attacker with the same uid as the imagecreator has unintended access to cloud-init and snapd directories.

criterions.comment: ubuntu-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
